trans-unit.source: Represents a class that is used to configure how the service authenticates users that use user name/password authentication and to configure the caching of logon tokens.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en klass som används för att konfigurera hur tjänsten autentiserar användare som använder autentisering med användarnamn och lösenord och konfigurera cachelagring av inloggning token.

trans-unit.source: If none of the bindings used by a service is configured for user name/password-based authentication, the relevant properties for this class are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Om ingen av de bindningar som används av en tjänst har konfigurerats för autentisering med användarnamn/lösenord namnbaserat ignoreras relevanta egenskaper för den här klassen.

trans-unit.source: These properties include the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Dessa egenskaper innehåller den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>, och <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>

trans-unit.source: If none of the bindings used by a service is configured to use Windows authentication for user name/password, the settings related to caching of logon tokens are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Om ingen av de bindningar som används av en tjänst är konfigurerade för att använda Windows-autentisering för användarnamn/lösenord ignoreras i inställningar för cachelagring av inloggning token.

trans-unit.source: These settings include the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Inställningarna omfattar den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>, och <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum length of time that a token is cached.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den maximala längden av tid som en token cachelagras.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that represents the maximum length of time that a token is cached`.` The default is 15 minutes.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.TimeSpan>som representerar den maximala längden av tid som en token cachelagras`.` standardvärdet är 15 minuter.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether logon tokens are cached.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om inloggning token cachelagras.

trans-unit.source: By default, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] security asks the Windows security subsystem to create a logon token for every incoming user name/password security token if the user name is being mapped to a Windows account.
trans-unit.target: Som standard [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] security begär undersystem för Windows-säkerhet att skapa ett inloggningstoken för varje inkommande säkerhetstoken för användare och lösenord om användarnamnet mappas till ett Windows-konto.

trans-unit.source: This behavior can be changed by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Detta beteende kan ändras genom att ange den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> mode, the service uses Win32's `LogonUser` function for user name/password authentication.
trans-unit.target: För <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>läge, tjänsten använder Win32's `LogonUser` funktionen för autentisering med användarnamn/lösenord.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: If the CacheLogonTokens is set to `true`, the resulting Windows token is cached and reused for the same user name/password pair.
trans-unit.target: Om CacheLogonTokens anges till `true`, den resulterande Windows-token cachelagras och återanvändas för samma användare och lösenord par.

trans-unit.source: The cache is valid for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Cacheminnet är giltigt för <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of caches is limited to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Det maximala antalet cacheminnen är begränsad till <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if logon tokens are cached; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>om inloggning token cachelagras; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom user name and password validator.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger en anpassad användare och lösenord verifieraren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> to take effect.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>egenskapen måste anges till <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>för den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>ska börja gälla.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property is set and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property is not, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] uses Windows authentication and ignores the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: När den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>egenskapen och <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>-egenskapen är inte, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] använder Windows-autentisering och ignoreras värdet för den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> mode, the service uses <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> for user name/password authentication by calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: För <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>läge, tjänsten använder <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator>för autentisering med användarnamn/lösenord genom att anropa den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator.Validate%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator.Validate%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: A custom user name and password validator.
trans-unit.target: En anpassad användare och lösenord verifieraren.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Windows groups are included in the security context.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om Windows-grupper tas med i säkerhetskontexten.

trans-unit.source: In most scenarios when validating Windows user names and passwords, Windows groups in which users belong provide useful information for authorization decisions.
trans-unit.target: I de flesta fall att verifiera Windows-användarnamn och lösenord, innehåller Windows-grupper som användarna tillhör användbar information vid auktoriseringsbeslut.

trans-unit.source: However, if the Windows groups are not required, setting this property to `false` can improve performance by avoiding a full-group claim population.
trans-unit.target: Men om Windows-grupper inte är obligatoriska, om denna egenskap anges `false` kan förbättra prestanda genom att inte en fullständig gruppanspråk population.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if Windows groups are included in the security context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om Windows-grupper ingår i säkerhetskontexten; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of logon tokens to cache.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger det maximala antalet inloggning token till cachen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 128.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är 128.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of logon tokens to cache.
trans-unit.target: Det maximala antalet inloggning token till cachen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger medlemskapsprovidern.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> mode, the service uses <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> for user name/password authentication by calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: För <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>läge, tjänsten använder <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>för autentisering med användarnamn/lösenord genom att anropa den <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> for the MembershipProvider to take effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>egenskapen måste anges till <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>för MembershipProvider ska börja gälla.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the MembershipProvider property is set and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property is not, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] uses Windows authentication and ignores the value of the MembershipProvider property.
trans-unit.target: När egenskapen MembershipProvider har angetts och <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>egenskapen är inte [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] använder Windows-autentisering och ignorerar värdet på egenskapen MembershipProvider.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> property is set to `MembershipProvider` and the `MembershipProvider` property is not set to a value, the default is the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>egenskapen `MembershipProvider` och `MembershipProvider` egenskapen har angetts till ett värde, standard är <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>klass</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> for this service.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>för den här tjänsten.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The default is the <xref href="System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är den <xref href="System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set this property when the credential is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Ett försök görs att ange den här egenskapen när autentiseringen är skrivskyddad.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the method of validating the user name and password.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger metoden för att verifiera användarnamn och lösenord.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> If this property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, the service uses the object returned by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A> to validate user names and passwords in incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: Möjliga värden är:- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>om den här egenskapen anges till <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, tjänsten använder objektet som returnerades av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>att verifiera användarnamn och lösenord i inkommande meddelanden.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service is hosted in Internet Information Services (IIS) using transport-level security and the UserNamePasswordValidationMode property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, the custom authentication scheme uses a subset of Windows authentication.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > När en [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] är värd för tjänsten i Internet Information Services (IIS) med säkerhet på transportnivå och UserNamePasswordValidationMode-egenskap är inställd på <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, anpassade autentiseringsschema använder en delmängd av Windows-autentisering.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: That is because in this scenario, IIS performs Windows authentication prior to [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] invoking the custom authenticator.
trans-unit.target: Det beror i det här scenariot IIS utför Windows-autentisering före [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] anropar anpassade autentiseraren.

trans-unit.source: When the value of this property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, specify the membership provider by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property, and then the membership provider instance specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property is used to validate the username and password in incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: När värdet för den här egenskapen anges till <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, ange medlemskapsprovidern genom att ange den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>egenskapen och providerinstans medlemskap som anges av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>egenskapen används för att verifiera användarnamnet och lösenordet i inkommande meddelanden.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: A value from the enumeration in <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ett värde från uppräkningen i <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode"> </xref>.
